column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183:
1-Family Treatment refers to manufactured/modular homes in a park or subdivision. Manufactured Home Park (MHP) requires a conditional use permit, while Manufactured Home Subdivision is allowed by-right.

MHP are treated as a planned residential development (PRD), while manufactured home subdivisions are allowed by subdivision process and do not require a master plan. MHP lots have different requirements from subdivision lots.

The RR District's purpose is to allow for residential subdivisions of single-family detached housing in agricultural areas of the county. Residential development is required to utilize one of three approaches to residential subdivision: 1)Timed Approach, 2) Sliding Scale, or 3) Cluster Development with Density Bonus.
